Hoop Snakes are monsters that live in the Tar Swamp area of Fossil Island.

They can be stunned using a weapon's crush option (or being unarmed), allowing the player to pick up the stunned hoop snake. From the inventory, snakes can be rolled in a direction, mainly used for stunning tar monsters.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The hoop snake derives from a piece of Australian folklore designed to scare tourists. It is described as a snake that bites its tail in order to roll in a hoop and travel at an incredibly high speed before uncurling and throwing itself at a victim.
  • The hoop snake is able to be first action stunned, if you attack it, you are able to instantly stun it and pick it up, before it is able to attack you back.

'''Hoop Snakes''' are monsters that live in the [[Tar Swamp]] area of [[Fossil Island]].

They can be [[Stun (status)|stunned]] using a weapon's crush option (or being [[unarmed]]), allowing the player to pick up the stunned [[Hoop snake (item)|hoop snake]]. From the inventory, snakes can be rolled in a direction, mainly used for stunning [[tar monster]]s.

==Trivia==
*The hoop snake derives from a piece of Australian folklore designed to scare tourists. It is described as a snake that bites its tail in order to roll in a hoop and travel at an incredibly high speed before uncurling and throwing itself at a victim.
*The hoop snake is able to be first action stunned, if you attack it, you are able to instantly stun it and pick it up, before it is able to attack you back.

{{Fossil Island}}
